title: Applied Biogeosciences Lab
text:
Northern Michigan University’s Applied Biogeosciences Lab specializes in integrating in-situ environmental monitoring techniques with data science strategies to develop sustainable natural resource management solutions



Artistic rendering of greenhouse gas emission monitoring at MSU-UPREC


This site is hosted by Dr. Matthew J. Van Grinsven Department of Earth Environmental & Geographical Sciences Department
For more information: https://nmu.edu/eegs/matthew-van-grinsven.
